Apparently, a group known as the The Mindshare Foundation in conjunction with another group known as The Human Ant Project have collaborated on an abortion known as The World Anthem. What they did was take all the World's national anthems compile them into a database that search for common notes and lyrics. The final result was this train-wreck mentioned above.
 
 To me, this sounds like a left wing ploy designed to further erode the national sovereignty of the U.S., not to mention that it is a truly a disgusting piece of music. If any of you are interested go to worldanthem.org to listen to a sample. Get back with me and tell me what you think of the music and the idea of having a world anthem.

the world anthem is a move made by people who support globalization. we might finally agree on something norman, globalization really sucks. that is why i am against free trade and a supporter of protective tariffs. free trade allows globalization to expand.
Its a left wing organization. They may see globalization a a necessity for true Marxism to exist. Whatever the case, they are avid communists, in my opinion.
i am not a communist and i am against globalization

Originally posted by fallingupwards 
 i am not a communist and i am against globalization 
 
 
 Good. I am glad that you represent a more reasonable side of the left-wing. As I stated before, I am used to debating with communists. Therefore, debating with rational people might take a paradyme shift, on my part. It is refreshing to see myself agreeing with a liberal for once. I don't know when the last time this happened was, as this represents a historical moment of my debate history.
 
 What did you think of the actual music? Wasn't it the most hideous thing you have ever heard? I know it made me want to throw up.
i didnt think it sucked musically, but i think the idea of having a world anthem is stupid
the people that made that anthem have way to much time on their hands
I agree with falling. It wasn't bad nusically (in a suddam kinda way). The idea of world peace is NEVER EVER EVER gonna happen!! What the heck is wrong with these people.
How weird. I am a pro free trade, pro globalization liberal, even though that is a generally conservative position. Odd.
you are right dsa. most conservatives are pro-trade and pro-globalization. most liberals support protective tariffs and are against globalization.
What do you guys have against free trade and globalization?

globalization destroys individual cultures and forces westernization on everyone.
 
 globalization is the 21st century's version of colonization and imperialism. but then again, broker probably thought imperialism was a good thing, so that wont make a good argument.

No he didn't :P 
 
 Countries are going to start unifying as we get further into the technology age... there is no need for the old ways.

but this will be at the expense of individuality and different cultures. 
 
 when europe colonized africa during the 19th century, african culture was totally destroyed. europeans tried to westernize africa and "civilize" the people. as a result, africa is in much worse shape than it was before the imperial age. for example, the political boundaries that were set split tribes and combined rival clans together. this is one reason why africa experiences so many civil wars.
France is fighting in one of those civil wars... we can't fight a threat but they can defend their former colony from rebels. Hmm...

ok you totally veered off topic. i'm not talking about iraq right now, i'm talking about imperialism and destroying culture. but on the side, i dont think france should fight a former colony's war. what do you think of destroying individual culture in order for us to have one big western culture? where everyone is the same, no matter what area of the world you live in?
 
 another question broker that i cant help but ask: do you believe americans are "superior" to other nationalities and do you believe that western culture is superior to other cultures? because if you do, then that would explain why you are a proponent of globalism.

What do you mean by superior? As in our people are superior? Of course not...our education system is getting lower and lower because of the disintegration of families and lack of motivation. You think our contry is great until you talk to the average voter for five minutes... 
 
 And what about those other cultures? They're starving, poor, the rich holding around 95% of the entire money supply... there's no middle class and they are missing the technology revolution. I think we should be spreading our ways...give a man a fish and he eats for a day. Teach the man to fish and he eats for the rest of his life. We're feeding 60% of the world and sending money to so many countries...I think the spread of Western culture is a good thing.

that is fine if we help those cultures out, but we should not force western ideas on them.
 
 its funny how you accuse other countries of having the rich hold 95% of the entire money supply when we live in a country where the top 1% of the country owns 80% of the wealth. bad example broker
Not really... it's probably the same 1% in those countries that hold 95%. 15% higher...
oooooo, 15% higher...woop-de-doo. 80% is still very very high. for every dollar, 1% of the population get 80 cents while 99% of the population has to split the 20 cents.
15% is a high amount. Those rich people are big investors...they're funding a lot of the companies.

they invest in other companies which in turn gives the CEO of that company more money. so in the end, you're just transferring money from one rich person to another. you're not solving the poverty problem.
I was just thinking... how very good that this is under the "silly, pointless, meaningless, fun debates" heading. :D

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  World Anthem
